components.name: welcome_text
components.source: # Modul de inscrieri in "Premiile FIBRA" Campaniile vor fi evaluate de cel mai bun juriu international, din agentii independente, dornic sa vada valoarea creativitatii romanesti. Anul acesta, presedintele Juriului este **Kevin Brady**, ECD, Droga5. **Pentru a inscrie o campanie/lucrare trebuie sa urmezi urmatorii pasi:** - Creeaza un cont pentru Agenția ta, sau daca esti freelancer pentru tine. - Inscrie lucrariile si informatiile solicitate in formularul la care ai acces in cont. **Info email:** [FIBRAAwards@IQads.ro](mailto://FIBRAAwards@IQads.ro)

components.name: create_account_btn
components.text: Creeaza cont

components.name: jury_public_text
components.source:
#Welcome to FIBRA!

Thank you for accepting our Invitation to the FIBRA Awards jury.

Please use your email & password (as emailed to you) to gain access to the submitted works.

components.name: welcome_text
components.source:
Intra in competitie 371 de lucrari in 14 Categorii.
Iti uram succes ls festivalul **FIBRA Awards**

* Ne vedem la conferintele si workshop-urile festivalului precum si la Gala de premiere si la After Party. Te asteptam si in seriile FIBRA. Ai toate detaliile despre programul zilelor de 3,4,5 si 6 mai, pe teme de discutie si speakers, pass-uri de acces  [aici](http://events.premiilefibra.ro/premiile-fibra)
* Locul de desfasurare este: [Caro Hotel Bucharest](http://events.premiilefibra.ro/premiile-fibra/loc)

components.name: Welcome
components.source:
#Welcome, {{userFullName}}!

371 Works were submitted in 14 Categories.

Based on the Information contained in the presentation of each work please assign grades between 1 and 10 to each.

__Rating criteria__ are
 * Originality
 * Context & contextual relevance 
 * Quality of execution

Each work competes in __one or more__ Sections

_Grades can be assigned to each of the criteria and to each submitted section_

For your convenience, we designed the grading process, such that you can start with an overall grade, and then refine the section/criteria grid as you see fit.

Your Grading, together with your peers' grading will be the basis for deciding which of the works will make it into the *Short List*



Feel free to contact [FIBRA](mailto:contact@iqads.ro) for any inquiries.
